tweet: Hi there, how can we help? If you are having difficulty reaching your school, please email us at info@mpsaz.org with your name, question or concern, school and grade, and your contact info. We will reach out to the school on your behalf and request assistance. Thank you!

name: Mesa Public Schools
tweet: Hi again, Allie. You will need to contact the school directly regarding enrollment status. School offices can currently be contacted via phone and email, with in-person services available by appointment only starting Monday, July 30.
